messages.subject: Wonderful music to recommend
messages.msgSnippet: I haven t posted here for many moons, busy doing life and having fun with my beautiful 5 year olds Jade and Skye!  I continue to read the daily digest though,
messages.messageBody:
I haven't posted here for many moons, busy doing life and having fun with my beautiful 5 year olds Jade and Skye!  I continue to read the daily digest though, and continue to be inspired by the writing.

Recently I came across a musical duo that is inspiring me and helping me to be a more relaxed and unschooly mama, so perhaps it may do the same for someone else here.

Check out www.worldofruby.com

You can listen to an amazing song "Awe" at www.worldofruby.com/awe and I believe even download it for free.

Enjoy :)

Jodi
